Head Blacksmith Ferris:
If you want to upgrade an item, you've come to the right person. I'll teach you to do that. Listen and memorize!
Steps to upgrade an item

1. The Equipment Upgrade will show only the items you can upgrade. 2. Click on the item you want to upgrade and press Upgrade. 3. After pressing Upgrade the window will automatically show the materials you need for that. 4. The items you can get as a result of upgrade will follow the description of materials. 5. Press Upgrade to start the process.
